original_text: That thou hast also built unto thee an eminent place, and hast made thee an high place in every street.
korean_text: 너를 위하여 누각을 건축하며 모든 거리에 높은 대를 쌓았도다

sentences.original_text: That thou hast also built unto thee an eminent place
sentences.korean_translation: 네가 또 너를 위해 높은 곳을 건축하였다는 것을

sentences.original_text: and hast made thee an high place in every street
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 모든 거리에 너를 위해 산당을 만들었다
